banner.title: ENERGYWISE - EASY.TRUSTWORTHY.RELIABLE.
banner.description: Stay up to date and be the first to use energywise.

section-head.title: energywise
section-head.description: Energywise provides personalized solutions and expert guidance for all your EV charging needs.

feature1.title: Charging station assessment
feature1.description: This survey will ask the customer questions about their daily driving habits, the type of EV they own, their home's electrical setup, and other relevant factors to determine the most suitable charging options for them.

feature2.title: Charging station directory
feature2.description: energywise will provide the customer with a list of charging station hardware and software options that best meet their needs, along with pricing information and installation options.

feature3.title: Technician directory
feature3.description: By simply entering their location, customers can access a list of reliable technicians in their area, complete with contact information and customer reviews.

feature4.title: About us
feature4.description: We, a group of students from Hochschule MÃ¼chen, created energywise to be your partner in your journey towards sustainable transportation by getting to know your needs and offering persosonalized information and guidance.

hero.first-line: The simplest way to get started with your
hero.slogan: Get started to charge your world from your finger tips.
